title: Does numerology belong to astorology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Astrology is related with planetary movements in the Universe. Horoscope to the individual is casted based on Date, Time, and Place of Birth. Each individual has unique Horoscope. Uniqueness is referred including Rasi, Degree, Minute positions of Planets and Ascendant. Numerology is entirely different from Astrology. Numerology deals with Numbers related to Date of Birth alone. On the same Date numerous Birth take place. Are they have identical life. Judge yourself.
Numerology is a different school of thought from Astrology. In Astrology, we will predict the future by reading your Horoscope whereas in Numerology prediction is based on birth no and destiny no.
